Entities

Class Showtime

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entities.Showtime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Showtime
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a showtime for each Movie.
    Since:
    2017-11-16
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • dayRate

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> dayRate
        Day Rates will be stored in a HashMap with day type as key and the corresponding rates as key-values. HashMap is used to create unique and non-duplicate key-value entry. 3 Different Keys: weekday/weekend/PH (i.e. public holiday). HashMap

    • Constructor Detail

      • Showtime

        public Showtime(java.lang.String title,
                java.lang.String showtime,
                java.lang.String day,
                java.lang.String hallCode,
                int maxCapacity)
        Create a new Showtime listing for each movie when given title, showtime, day, hallCode, maxCapacity. BookingHistory and userAgeRate will be initialized with NULL value. dayRate and PHDays will be initialized with a NULL value
        Parameters:
        title - This Showtime's title.
        showtime - This Showtime's show timing.
        day - This Showtime's day.
        hallCode - This Showtime's hall code.
        maxCapacity - This Showtime's max capacity.

    • Method Detail

        public void updateMaxCapacity(int maxCapacity)

      • updateLayout

        public void updateLayout(int index)
        Changes the layout of this Showtime. Sets the particular seat to occupied which is "1" based on the row and column.
        Parameters:
        index - The index which represent index of the seat in Array.

      • updateDayRate

        public void updateDayRate(java.lang.String dayType,
                          java.lang.Double rate)
        Changes the day rates of different day types (Eg. Weekday, Weekend, Public Holiday). A HashMap is used, so that it creates a unique entry for each day rate
        Parameters:
        dayType - Represents weekday, weekend or public to update the rate.
        rate - Represents the new rate to be updated

      • updatePH

        public void updatePH(java.lang.String toBePH)
        Allows the Admin to set the days to be labeled as public holiday.
        Parameters:
        toBePH - Represents the date to be changed as public holiday and added to the List of Strings PHDAYs. Date format in string type, eg: Sunday, November 12, 2017

      • getDayRate

        public java.lang.Double getDayRate(java.lang.String dayType)
        Gets the Ticket Rate for different show day depending on whether is it weekday, weekend or public holiday
        Parameters:
        dayType - Represents weekday, weekend or public to update the rate.
        Returns:
        this Showtime's dayRate.

      • getDayRateHash

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getDayRateHash()
        Gets the HashMap of the Day Type Rate. Each Day Type Rate is the same regardless of individual Showtimes.
        Returns:
        this Showtime's HashMap dayRate.

      • getPHList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPHList()
        Gets the List of String objects containing days set as public holiday.
        Returns:
        this Showtime's List of String Objects PHDays.
